paqdapa#~gktiq SCandOq &kShara#pa~gktiq SCandO# viShTAqrapa#~gktiq SCanda#H kShuqrO BRujvAq~jCanda#H praqcCacCanda#H paqkSha SCandaq Evaq SCandOq vari#vaq SCandOq vayaq SCandO# vayaqskRucCandO# viSAqlaM CandOq
